title: What is an onion browser? Who can use it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tor is free and open-source software for enabling anonymous communication. Original software project name "The Onion Router” (calls Onion browser) Development has come from the federal government of the United States,Initially through the Office of Naval Research and DARPA.Onion routing was further developed by DARPA in 1997. Onion browser is also one type of Client browser like Google chrome, Firefox, UCbrowser. You came across some domains like .com, .in, .org, .edu etc., likewise other domain like .onion, .i2p etc., are there those can be accessed using onion browser. It uses Orbot VPN to access domains. It also provides other search engines to access those domains. HOPE THIS WILL BE HELPFUL..!
